caption=Tosser Grubb in ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''

column3: ''The Hobbit'' film series]]. He was was portrayed by Merv Smith.

column1: Tosser Grubb was the auctioneer for [[Messrs Grubb, Grubb and Burrowes]] in charge of selling [[Bilbo Baggins]]'s possessions and [[Bag End]]. When Bilbo himself arrived, Tosser was apprehensive. Bilbo gave him the contract he had with the Dwarves, which Tosser found sufficient to prove his identity.<ref>''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''</ref>
